attributes.action: Help ensure Kenny Richey has a fair and safe trial.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Kenny Richey has been on Ohio's death Row for 21 years, for a crime which all scientific evidence shows was no crime at all. We at the Official Kenny Richey Campaign urge Mr Brown to ensure that The State of Ohio gives Mr Richey a safe trial where ALL the evidence can be heard for the very FIRST Time in 21 years.

We believe there has been a miscarriage of justice which needs to be rectified.
